name: Oceania (LemonSquar3)
description:
Welcome to Oceania, the land of sea (a bit contradictory but it's accurate).

You'll join Joey on his Island Adventure in search of his mother Raina.
Along the way he gets mixed up with an evil army trying to take over the land with their machinations.

Can you fight back this evil and find your mom?!

Controls:

Keyboard

  • LEFT/RIGHT = Move
  • UP = Move/Interact
  • DOWN = Move 
  • A = Run
  • S = Jump
  • D = Attack (must be running in 2d platforming sections)
  • Enter = Pause menu

Music by @ActEsper
